article_title: Do Some Looking And Thinking Before Signing Form 1040

article_metadata.description: We are approaching that magical time when the signing of tax returns becomes a last second fire drill, particularly for the half of a couple, that is least involved in getting the return prepared.  I'd like to suggest that you take a deep breath and actually look at your return [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter J Reilly
